game_description: Slap Fighting Champion game is a virtual reality game that takes you on an entertaining and extraordinary experience. With immersive graphics and exciting mechanics, it invites you to a world where you test your skills in defeating enemies using virtual slaps. Fast-paced, addictive, and completely innovative, Slap Fighting Champion Game offers a surreal battle experience, pushing your limits. You'll feel like a real fighter, immersed in an adrenaline-fueled VR adventure. Gain different experiences by training and increase your strength and endurance. Fight with many opponents in many different venues and tournaments and show who is the champion. We only ask you to pay attention to your surroundings while playing this game. You can really slap someone :)
review_1: -Way to much money -Very little content -Jankie mechanics -Completely silent -Not entertaining -Can’t even finish the story mode
review_2: Very fun overall but the basketball is impossible. It’s a little bit harder for short people like me and until you until you realize oh, I’m gonna lose this fight you need to upgrade. I would’ve given it a five star but the basketball is atrocious. But I would still buy and maybe if you’re interested in a type of game like this just look in Apple app and type in slap and it brings up a five dollar game and if you enjoy it maybe you can do this.
review_3: First impressions gameplay here (remove the space before 'be'): https://youtu. be/Zy1dPNOSV4I The scale of the characters is a bit amusingly odd, and I'm not sure how much difference a harder swing does in relation to damage dealt, but nevertheless - giving somebody a good slap never gets old!
